channel.title: live motion-capture on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in live motion-capture on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Adobe Character Animator Logo
Adobe Character Animator is an Emmy Award-winning desktop application software product that combines live motion-capture with a multi-track recording system to control layered 2D puppets drawn in Photoshop or Illustrator. It is automatically installed with Adobe After Effects CC 2015 to 2017 and is also available as a standalone application which one can download separately as part of a Creative Cloud all-apps subscription. It is used to produce both live and non-live animation.
You can download theAdobe Character Animatorlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Adobe Character Animator
item.description: Adobe Character Animator is an Emmy Award-winning desktop application software product that combines live motion-capture with a multi-track recording system to control layered 2D puppets drawn in Photoshop or Illustrator. It is automatically installed with Adobe After Effects CC 2015 to 2017 and is also available as a standalone application which one can download separately as part of a Creative Cloud all-apps subscription. It is used to produce both live and non-live animation.
